DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to assess which factors influence the pain perceived during diagnostic anesthesia-free hysteroscopy.
DOC.criteria: female gender diagnostic hysteroscopy indication italianspeaking patients patients who had previously undergone a diagnostic hysteroscopy patients who had been previously undergone to cervical surgery ongoing pregnancy cervical carcinoma pelvic inflammatory disease excessive uterine bleeding performance of an endometrial biopsy during the procedure
